update agr_agreement
AGREEMENT_ID = #{record.agreementId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

AGR_SOURCE = #{record.agrSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IS_ADDENDUM = #{record.isAddendum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RENEW_TIMES = #{record.renewTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPERATOR_ID = #{record.operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{record.organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
